sentences.sContent: But there’s very little doubt that if methane emissions are as large as this, there will be severe biological and geochemical impacts.
sentences.sContent_eng: But there’s very little doubt that if methane emissions are as large as this, there will be severe biological and geochemical impacts.
sentences.sCn: 但有一点很肯定，如果甲烷排放量确实是如此大，必将产生严重的生物和地球化学影响。

sentences.sContent: He will have to make more observations and wait for geochemical analysis of the rocks Alvin has picked up to learn the answer to this question, but it's a start and Sinton is excited.
sentences.sContent_eng: He will have to make more observations and wait for geochemical analysis of the rocks Alvin has picked up to learn the answer to this question, but it's a start and Sinton is excited.
sentences.sCn: 要揭开这一问题的秘底，他还须进行进一步的观测，并等待对阿尔文号采集的这些岩石所进行的地质化学分析结果。 而这还只是个开始，这不禁令辛顿倍感兴奋。

phrases.pCn: 地球化学异常，地化异常
地球化学酌；地球化学过程
